website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight flip flop with contoured rubber soles and a modest platform. Budget-friendly and versatile.
pros: Thongs are thin with rolled seams to minimize friction between the toes
T-strap is thick and lightly padded to provide a comfortable fit across the instep
Upward tilt of the toe area gives the flip flop an ergonomic shape
cons: Some consumers feel the adidas logos and emblems are too small or hidden, giving the flip flops a nondescript appearance

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: My wife finds these very comfortable and supportive as she copes with plantar fasciitis although they would be better with arch support. Good value for the money and they look good, too. Highly recommended for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: JWG

customer_reviews.title: Bigfoot beware!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sasquatch. I ordered a size 8 and they fit like a size 12...
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality i expected.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not what i expected from this brand. They are made if cheaper materials, and are thinner. I had an old outworn pair that i loved. They lasted forever and were so comfy. These are not the same. They also run large.
customer_reviews.author: Blkirisherri

customer_reviews.title: love em
customer_reviews.text: super soft and comfortable not to mention cute! I love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Wide bottom
customer_reviews.text: These are bright and comfy. Though they look more like unisex flips, they are wide and really could be worn by either. The only think doing my husband is the color.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Women's Comfort Flip Flop
customer_reviews.text: The top sole of the shoes due to its color can easily get dirty. wash your feet before wearing it. The 3 strips wearing out causing a uncomfortable feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Mez Toofan

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable/ Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Super comfortable . The color ( I got the pink) is vibrant . They are like walking on a cloud. I will buy another pair definitely !
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON GENNUSO

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Sporty
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them, she stated they are very very comfortable and sporty. Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: K. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: True to size and comfortable. Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: Good and pretty. True to size. They are comfortable and great color.
customer_reviews.author: Noelia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are so comfortable! By far my favorite pair for walking the dog and for going out and about! Will definitely get other colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Run small. Usually a 6. Needed bigger. Ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: Wine and cheese

customer_reviews.title: PEACE 🚣‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: They run big but they are still fine the color is a lot brighter then picture but all and all fine as 🍷 and just my kind stepping out 🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Like that

customer_reviews.title: Big difference between color photo and actual shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when I opened up the box--it was orange, not pink!
customer_reviews.author: William  R Kalman

customer_reviews.title: flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife she doesn't hate them but she says they make her feet sweat because of the material the fit and feel is good
customer_reviews.author: Jon Roper

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a nine and it’s way too big it feels like a size 11 and the left and right are two different colors
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right!
customer_reviews.text: The toe area has inches of slack like clown shoes. These are built funny and did not fit correctly to scale. DO NOT waste money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Ann B

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Comfort Flip Flop Slide Sandal
product_meta.description: Women's slides. Driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation as well as decades of accumulating sports science expertise, we cater for all, from elite professional athletes and teams to any individual who wants to able sport part of their lives.
feature_bullets: The adidas brand has a long history and deep.5Rooted Connection with sport. Everything we do is rooted in sport
